item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Azure NetApp Files support in OpenShift Virtualization
item.description:
Azure NetApp Files is now available in Public Preview for OpenShift Virtualization, providing fast VM provisioning, instant cloning, live migration, and scalable storage with predictable performance and enterprise data management for VM workloads.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: OpenShift Virtualization now available on Azure Red Hat OpenShift
item.description:
Red Hat OpenShift Virtualization is now generally available on Azure Red Hat OpenShift (ARO), enabling customers to run and manage virtual machines and containers from a single cloud-native platform. The GA release builds on feedback from the preview announced at Red Hat Summit.

  • Source: Azure Updates
